result.title: Social media report
result.description: Concerning social media, EnRRICH will start with a survey of tools used by partners added by an inquiry of their relevance for project and network related aims and issues. A summary report with links and description of relevance will be delivered. The most relevant social media and how to make use of them will be integrated into the dissemination action plan for all partners.

result.title: WeLive Evaluation Report v1
result.description: This report includes an evaluation plan describing methods for collecting user feedback, and analysing the data. Further the document describes the actual main findings of the evaluation in respect to predefined KPIs. Citizen insights will be elaborated in order to showcase success and failure points in the system.

result.title: WeLive framework requirements and architecture v1
result.description: This document will include a specification of the functional and non-functional requirements of WeLive’s stakeholders.
